# ğŸ¬ Clipperin v0.1.0 - First Release!

**Clipperin** is a self-hosted video clipping solution that transforms long YouTube videos into viral short clips without recurring API fees.

## âœ¨ What's New

### Core Features
- ğŸ¥ **Video Download** - Download from YouTube and 1000+ sites via yt-dlp
- ğŸ§ **Local Transcription** - Whisper AI runs offline, no OpenAI API needed
- ğŸ“ **7 Caption Styles** - Professional burned-in subtitles (default, karaoke, minimal, bold, neon, tiktok, typewriter)
- ğŸ§  **AI Chapter Analysis** - Smart highlight detection (Gemini, Groq, OpenAI)
- ğŸ¯ **Rule-based Fallback** - Free alternative to AI analysis
- ğŸ“± **Multiple Aspect Ratios** - 9:16, 1:1, 4:5

### AI Features (Optional)
- ğŸª **Auto Hook** - Generate viral intro text overlays
- ğŸ“ **Smart Reframe** - Track speaker face, keep centered (uses OpenCV - FREE!)
- ğŸ“Š **Progress Bar** - Customizable color and style

### Three Ways to Use
1. **CLI** - `clipperin` command for terminal users
2. **Web UI** - Beautiful dashboard at http://localhost:3000
3. **Python Library** - Import `clipperin_core` in your own projects

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### With Docker (Recommended)
```bash
git clone https://github.com/codewithrafli/clipperin.git
cd clipperin
cp .env.example .env
docker-compose up --build
# Open http://localhost:3000
```

### With CLI
```bash
pip install clipperin-core clipperin-cli
clipperin pipeline "https://youtube.com/watch?v=xxx" -o ./output
```

## ğŸ’° Cost Comparison

| Tool | Monthly Cost |
|------|-------------|
| OpusClip | $29-99/month |
| CapCut Pro | $10-30/month |
| **Clipperin** | **FREE** (one-time setup) |

AI transcription is FREE (Whisper). AI analysis costs ~Rp 40/video with Groq free tier.
